text: 1:4 1 Timoti 4:7; 2 Timoti 2:14-16; Taitus 1:14Egh me pura eghaghanir araziba ko men ovavibar ziar mɨgɨrɨgɨar me zurara mɨgɨavɨra itiba, da atakigh. Akar kaba men nɨghnɨzibagh amima me onganighava tintinibar uariv gɨa uari adosi. Akar kaba me damutɨ, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikian kogham, egh God e damuamin bizim me deragh a gɨfoghan kogham.
